extendedInfo.description: Experience the most realistic pool game simulator. Whether a beginner or a pro Pool Rebel will keep you occupied for hours on end. Pool Rebel was initially released on Windows Mobile winning the AT&T Game Development Contest for Windows Mobile 2008 http://www.poolrebel.com/Documents/ATTPressRelease.pdfIt was soon after released for iPhone and later iPad and is currently rated by AppAdvice.com as the best pool game on the AppStore http://www.appadvice.com/appguides/show/best-billiards-pool-apps.The Android version offers the following features:- One Pocket and 14.1 Continuous pool games. (Full version includes five pool games implemented according to the official rulebooks: 8-ball, 8-Ball UK, 9-Ball, 14.1 Continuous and One Pocket) - Online gaming- OpenFeint Enabled- Intuitive interface that allows control of every aspect of a shot - Dynamic player hints help you avoid common mistakes during gameplay - Save & Load a game at any stage. Automatically resume interrupted games - Full game history with unlimited undo/redo functionality - Adjustable difficulty levels (Full version offers fully customizable difficulty levels)- Tablet support (Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy Tab, etc.)
